TimeSensitiveLogic.OwnershipConfirmation: The confirmOwner function allows for time-sensitive confirmation of ownership transfer.

ConditionalLogicPaths.WithdrawTokenCondition: Executes only if Holders[_to] > 0 for WitdrawTokenToHolder.
ConditionalLogicPaths.WithdrawToHolderCondition: Executes only if Holders[_addr] >= _wei and Holders[msg.sender] > 0.
